availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Jane Ford. Father of Bettie Ford, Samuel H. Ford, Annah L. Ford, William O. Ford, and Mary W. Ford. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 8, p. 440B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 327.
Find A Grave, "Calvin Ford (1817-1866)," Memorial #28937108, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28937108 (accessed February 28, 2019).
